# Quarto {background-color="black" background-image="media/contour.png" background-size="initial" background-position="right"}

## Hello Quarto

> Quarto is an open-source *document creation system* based upon a tool called [Pandoc](https://pandoc.org/).

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
These tools allow you to weave together, raw data, analysis code, analysis output, graphics, and interactive elements into a single document that can be turned into a wide variety of products.
:::

::: {.fragment .fade-in}
This means that you do not have to copy-paste from analysis -> Excel -> Word -> Powerpoint -> etc. 
:::

## So what is Quarto?

> Quarto is an open source scientific and technical publishing system.

-   HTML reports, blogs, and websites.\
-   PDF & Word documents.\
-   Presentations (Powerpoint, Beamer, revealjs).\
-   Technical Books & Journal Articles.\
-   Dashboards.
-   Projects.

## YAML

YAML (Yet Another Markdown Language) is a method of setting meta-data for the whole document. 
 
- It **must** be at the top of the document.  

- It is *delimited* by three dashes, one set above and one below.


## Markdown

Markdown is a method to typeset *text* using only keyboard commands.  Plain text is displayed as body styled texts.  

Markdown              | Result   
----------------------|-------------  
\*italic\*            |  *italic*  
\*\*bold\*\*          |  **bold**   
\~\~strikethrough\~\~ | ~~strikethrough~~


## Unordered Lists

Lists are manually created using either dashes or numbers.  

&nbsp;

In Markdown, this:  

\- This item  
\- That item  

&nbsp;

Is rendered as: 

- This item  
- That item   


## Image & Links

URL's can be used to include both to webpages and images (either online or as a path relative to the document you are making on the computer).  



| Markdown                          | Rendered As                         |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------|
| \[CES\](https://ces.vcu.edu)      | [CES](https://ces.vcu.edu)          |
| !\[Goat\](media/goat.jpg) | ![alt text](media/goat.jpg) |
